data.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie: ACID Special Provision Pack Set / ACID特別支給品セット / ACID特別補給包
data.detailed_description:
Add Marks, Medals, Party Points, items, Special Weapon Designs, and the Early Summer Fashion Catalog with the ACID Special Provision Pack Set.

The following will be added:
・[2500] Marks x 3
・[10] Medals x 4
・[50] PP x 4
・[5000] Marks

The following items will be added:
・Remedine Pack EX x 3
・Activator x 3
・Hard Upper x 5
・Act Upper x 5
・Power Upper x 5
・Aim Upper x 5
・Stamina Upper x 5
・Memory Upper x 5
・Speed Upper x 5
・Technical Upper x 5

・Special Weapon Designs Type 0
※A new lineup will be added within the Development Room's [Development].
※You will need to progress the game until you have access to [Remodel].

・Remedine Pack EX x 3
・Activator x 3
・Hard Upper x 5
・Act Upper x 5
・Power Upper x 5
・Aim Upper x 5
・Stamina Upper x 5
・Memory Upper x 5
・Speed Upper x 5
・Technical Upper x 5

・Special Weapon Designs New Type
※A new lineup will be added within the Development Room's [Development].
※You will need to progress the game until you have access to [Remodel].

・Remedine Pack EX x 3
・Activator x 3
・Hard Upper x 5
・Act Upper x 5
・Power Upper x 5
・Aim Upper x 5
・Stamina Upper x 5
・Memory Upper x 5
・Speed Upper x 5
・Technical Upper x 5

・Special Weapon Designs Type 5
※A new lineup will be added within the Development Room's [Development].
※You will need to progress the game until you have access to [Remodel].

・Energy Pill EX x 2
・Energy Pack SP x 2
・Deepas Medicine EX x 2
・Deepas Pack EX x 2
・Activator x 3
・Hard Upper x 5
・Act Upper x 5
・Power Upper x 5
・Aim Upper x 5
・Stamina Upper x 5
・Memory Upper x 5
・Speed Upper x 5
・Technical Upper x 5

・Early Summer Fashion Catalog
※A new lineup will be added within the Development Room's [Tailoring].

※Uninstalling DLC items may prevent users from loading save files made before the DLC item was uninstalled. To ensure that users can load all Dark Rose Valkyrie save files, we recommend that users do NOT uninstall DLC items.

data.short_description: Add Marks, Medals, Party Points, items, Special Weapon Designs, and the Early Summer Fashion Catalog with the special ACID Special Provision Pack Set.

fullgame.name: Dark Rose Valkyrie / クロバラノワルキューレ / 黑玫瑰女武神

data.supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
